markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necromantic Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3477) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 28</row>

**Archetype** [Undead Slayer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=174)

**Prerequisites**
[Undead Slayer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3474)

</column>

---

As part of your training, you've inured yourself against necromancy through grueling, repeated exposure. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) effects and gain resistance to [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) damage equal to half your level.
name: Necromantic Resistance
